data.name: DataPrivacyMainText
data.value:
Privacy Policy of Red Valley Software GmbH for the App “Sepp App”** Effective Date: September 2025
Protecting your personal data is a key concern for us. This privacy policy informs you about the processing of your personal data in connection with the use of the “Sepp App” in accordance with applicable data protection laws:
- EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - Revised Swiss Data Protection Act (revDSG) - UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018 - Privacy and Electronic Communications Regulations (PECR) in the UK - California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) in the USA
1. Data Controller
The controller responsible for data processing in connection with this app is: **Red Valley Software GmbH** Am Pumperhölzl 12 84323 Massing, Germany Email: [rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com](mailto:rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com) Website: [www.redvalley-software.com](https://www.redvalley-software.com)
2. Types of Data Processed
This app is ad-supported. Therefore, the following personal data may be processed by integrated third-party providers:
- Advertising IDs (e.g., IDFA, GAID) - IP address - Device information (e.g., model, operating system) - Location data (if enabled) - Usage behavior (e.g., clicks, session duration)
Additionally, the following data may be processed when using specific features:
- Game score - Time of gameplay - Feedback sent via email
3. Purposes of Data Processing
- Providing app functionality - Displaying personalized advertisements - Analyzing and improving the app - Publishing scores on the global leaderboard - Evaluating competitions (e.g., monthly challenges) - Processing user feedback
4. Legal Basis for Processing
- Consent (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR / Art. 6 revDSG / Art. 6 UK GDPR) - Contract performance (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR / UK GDPR) - Legitimate interest, where permitted (e.g., fraud prevention)
5. Advertising, Tracking & Cookies
Third-party providers display ads within the app. Personal data is not processed by the app itself but by the integrated ad networks. These providers may collect:
- Advertising IDs (e.g., IDFA, GAID) - IP address - Device information (e.g., model, OS) - Location data (if enabled) - Usage behavior (e.g., clicks, session duration)
Ad networks used:
- Google AdMob - Facebook Audience Network - AppLovin
Processing is carried out exclusively by these third parties and only with your explicit consent under Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR / UK GDPR. For more information, please refer to the privacy policies of the respective providers.
**Note for UK users:** This processing is also subject to the Privacy and Electronic Communications Regulations (PECR). Consent is obtained via a consent management tool before technologies such as cookies or SDKs are activated.
---
6. Consent Management
We obtain your consent via a consent management tool. You may withdraw your consent at any time using the “Withdraw Consent” button at the top of the app.
---
7. Feedback via Email
If you send us feedback, we process your email address and the content of your message solely to respond to your inquiry.
8. Data Sharing & Transfers
Data is only shared where necessary for the stated purposes or if you have given consent. Transfers to third countries (e.g., the USA) are carried out only in compliance with legal requirements:
- EU: Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decision - Switzerland: Art. 16 ff. revDSG - UK: UK IDTA or adequacy decision
9. Data Retention
Data is retained only as long as necessary for the stated purposes or as required by law. After that, data is deleted or anonymized.
10. Your Rights
Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the following rights:
- Access - Rectification - Erasure - Restriction of processing - Data portability - Objection - Withdrawal of consent
To exercise your rights, please contact: Email: [rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com](mailto:rupert.eder@redvalley-software.com)
11. Special Notice for UK Users
In addition to the GDPR, UK users are subject to the UK GDPR, the Data Protection Act 2018, and PECR. We process your data in accordance with these regulations. Transfers outside the UK are only made with appropriate safeguards (e.g., UK IDTA).
12. Children and Minors
Our app is not directed at children under the age of 13. If we become aware that personal data of children has been processed without parental consent, we will delete it immediately. For users in the USA, the Children’s Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) applies. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13 in accordance with COPPA.
13. Technical and Organizational Measures (TOMs)
We protect your data through:
- Encryption during data transmission - Access restrictions - Regular security updates - Secure server locations
14. Notice for US Users (especially California)
For users residing in the United States, especially California, the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) apply. You have the following rights:
- Right to know what personal data is collected - Right to delete your personal data - Right to opt out of the sale of personal data - Right to data portability
We do not sell personal data as defined under the CCPA. Data is only shared with third parties to provide app functionality or with your explicit consent.
15. “Do Not Sell My Personal Information” (for California Users)
Under the CCPA and CPRA, California users have the right to opt out of the sale of their personal data.
You can exercise this right using the “Withdraw Consent” button described in Section 6. For California users, this opt-out is treated as a “Do Not Sell My Personal Information” request. Your choice is stored via our consent management tool and can be changed at any time.
